title: nee dhaya raavalegaaka
sahitya:
nI daya rAvalegAka nEnenta vADanu rAma



anupallavi



 vEda shAstra purANamulanni nIvE gati anucu morabeTTu ganuka



caraNam 1



 sArasAra kantAra caramada vidAra sundarAkAra suguNa 

sukumAra mA ramaNa nIrajAptakula pArAvAra sudhArasa pUrNa

   

caraNam 2



 shrI harE vara vidEhajAdhipa vivAha daLita ripu dEha shESa 

samabAhA sajjana samUha vairimada dAhA mauni hrdgEhA nAdupai

   

caraNam 3



 Adi dEva dEvAdi mrgya sanakAdi vinuta kAmAdi sadguNa 

harAdi madhya rahitAdi tyAgarAjAdi vandita vivAdi mada haraNa
